Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.feature

Class BooleanAbstraction

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.feature.BooleanAbstraction
public class BooleanAbstraction extends Object
Boolean abstraction for conditions in preprocessor macros. Boolean abstraction heuristically reduces expressions in higher-order logic (e.g., including arithmetics of function calls) to a propositional formula. Non-boolean expressions are replaced by respectively named variables.
Author:
Paul Bittner

  • Method Details

    • arithmetics

      public static String arithmetics​(String formula)
      Abstracts all arithmetics in the given formula. For example, a formula "3 >= 1 + 2" would be abstracted to a single variable "3__GEQ__1__ADD__2". The given formula should be a string of a CPP conforming condition.
      Parameters:
      formula - The formula whose arithmetics should be abstracted.
      Returns:
      A copy of the formula with abstracted arithmetics.

    • functionCalls

      public static String functionCalls​(String formula)
      Abstracts all function calls in the given formula. For example, a call "FOO(3, 4, lol)" would be abstracted to a single variable "FOO__3__4__lol". The given formula should be a string of a CPP conforming condition.
      Parameters:
      formula - The formula whose function calls should be abstracted.
      Returns:
      A copy of the formula with abstracted function calls.
